modules.description: Provides pretty-printing for source code positions using a tuple of file name, line, column, and offset. Accepts a formatter and a position tuple to output structured location data. Used to annotate log messages with precise file and location information during compilation or analysis.

Provides versioned storage and retrieval of custom data types with support for branching, merging, and conflict resolution. Operates on structured data, enabling efficient tracking of changes in distributed systems. Used to manage state in unikernel applications, allowing automated synchronization across multiple nodes with customizable storage backends.

Provides structured location data for source code positions, including file, line, column, and offset. Accepts a formatter and a position tuple to generate human-readable output. Enables precise annotation of log messages with contextual information during compilation or analysis. Supports custom formatting of error and debug messages with detailed source references.
